current_state: Siloed expertise in Backend and DevOps.
recommended_action: Dedicate 4 hours per sprint for the Lead Backend Developer to pair with the DevOps Engineer on Terraform modules. This builds redundancy.
expected_benefit: Reduces single-point-of-failure risk for infrastructure changes by 40%.
success_metrics: Backend developer can independently manage and deploy a minor infrastructure change.
roi_calculation: Avoids a potential 2-week project delay, saving approximately $20,000 in resource costs.

current_state: QA Engineer is the primary owner of E2E tests, creating a bottleneck.
recommended_action: Mandate that the Definition of Done for every frontend and backend feature includes at least one passing E2E test written by the developer.
expected_benefit: Increases test coverage, catches bugs earlier, and frees up QA capacity for exploratory and accessibility testing.
success_metrics: At least 50% of new E2E tests are contributed by developers.
roi_calculation: Reduces bug fix time by 30%, saving approximately 40 developer-hours over the project.
